title: Katharine McPhee enjoys night out with husband David Foster in LA
text:
They tied the knot in an intimate ceremony in London over the summer.

And Katharine McPhee and her husband David Foster looked every inch the happy couple as they arrived at Craig's restaurant in Los Angeles for The Jonas Brothers' concert after party on Monday.

The actress, 35, cut a stylish figure for her evening out, donning a black sleeveless top with a deep v-neckline.

Date night: Katharine McPhee and her husband David Foster looked every inch the happy couple as they arrived at Craig's restaurant in Los Angeles on Monday

She paired it with a mustard miniskirt with large pockets that featured a tassel embellishment while the hitmaker added height to her frame with black ankle boots.

Styling her brunette locks into a ponytail, Katharine completed her look for the night with hoop earrings.

Her other half David, 69, kept it casual, sporting a white shirt with blue jeans and dark shoes.

The two met back when Katharine was still a contestant on American Idol back in 2006.

Fashion: The actress cut a stylish figure for her evening out, donning a black sleeveless top with a deep v-neckline

At that time, she performed the song I Have Nothing which was written by David who helped her rehearse the song before the big performance.

The two grew so close that he was a guest at her first wedding in which she married Nick Cokas back in 2008. She filed for divorce in 2014.

Dating rumors then began to heat up in May of 2017 after Katharine and David were spotted dining out at Nobu in Malibu.

'I'm really, really fond of him, and I think he's an incredible person,' she said during her interview with Health for their December 2017 issue.

Style: She paired it with a mustard miniskirt with large pockets that featured a tassel embellishment while she added height to her frame with black ankle boots

'I've known him since I was 21 years old, you know? He produced my first single. So he's been really good to me. People can say whatever they want.'

And in July of 2018 it became official when he proposed to his longtime love in July last year.

The two later made things official in London over the summer during a small intimate ceremony with nearly 100 guests.

David has been married four times and has five daughters and seven grandchildren. His last marriage to Yolanda Hadid came to an end in 2017.
description: The pair looked every inch the happy couple as they arrived at Craig's restaurant in Los Angeles for The Jonas Brothers' concert after party on Monday.
